scripts.optmize-css: postcss styles.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output dist/styles.css --no-map
scripts.transpile-js: babel script.js -o dist/script.js --presets=@babel/preset-env && babel result.js -o dist/result.js --presets=@babel/preset-env
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run optmize-css && npm run transpile-js && npm run minify-js-1 && npm run minify-js-2
